decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing +1/+1 counters and efficient removal spells to create a fast and aggressive board presence. By playing powerful creatures like Winding Constrictor and Verdurous Gearhulk, the deck can quickly overwhelm opponents. Nissa, Voice of Zendikar and Rishkar, Peema Renegade help generate additional creatures and mana, while cards like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness keep the opponent's board in check. Overall, this Golgari Aggro deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain board control to secure a victory in the mid to late game.

This deck focuses on building a board presence quickly and efficiently by playing low-cost creatures and aggressive threats. It utilizes powerful cards such as Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, Toolcraft Exemplar, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Thalia, Heretic Cathar to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to deal with threats while maintaining aggression. Additionally, it uses vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester to maximize damage output and swing the game in its favor.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly building up a board presence with efficient creatures and utilizing +1/+1 counters to pump them up. It also aims to protect its creatures with instant speed combat tricks like Blossoming Defense while maintaining card advantage through cards like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner. The deck's strategy revolves around applying pressure early and overwhelming the opponent with high-powered threats, backed up by removal spells like Fatal Push to deal with any opposing threats. Overall, the deck aims to be fast, aggressive, and resilient in the Standard format.

The deck focuses on building a fast and aggressive board presence, utilizing powerful vehicles and efficient creatures to deal damage quickly to the opponent. Cards like Heart of Kiran and Fleetwheel Cruiser, along with removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push, help control the battlefield and push through damage. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Chandra, Torch of Defiance provide additional threats and card advantage, while the deck's mana base allows for consistent and smooth mana development. Overall, the strategy aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats and removal options.

The deck focuses on creating an infinite combo loop by using Saheeli Rai's -2 ability to generate copies of Felidar Guardian, which then blinks Saheeli Rai and allows her ability to be used again, creating more copies. This loop can generate an army of creature tokens with haste, overwhelming the opponent quickly. The deck includes control elements like Disallow, Negate, and removal spells like Immolating Glare and Fumigate to protect the combo. The mana base is designed to support the combo while also providing consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying strong creatures while disrupting the opponent with removal spells. By utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade, the deck can generate a lot of +1/+1 counters to make its creatures bigger and more threatening. Combining this with efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness allows the deck to control the board and push for early victories. The inclusion of Lifecrafter's Bestiary and Aethersphere Harvester provides card draw and lifegain to help maintain the deck's tempo and pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy by utilizing creatures like Walking Ballista, Hissing Quagmire, and Grim Flayer to put pressure on opponents. The deck focuses on the synergy between Winding Constrictor and +1/+1 counter creatures like Verdurous Gearhulk and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Murder to deal with threats. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Traverse the Ulvenwald to help find key creatures and lands when needed.

The deck focuses on using early aggressive creatures like Walking Ballista and Grim Flayer, supported by powerful cards like Rishkar, Peema Renegade and Verdurous Gearhulk to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to control the board, while cards like Tireless Tracker and Traverse the Ulvenwald provide card advantage and deck thinning. By combining the strengths of both Aggro and Golgari strategies, this deck aims to win the game quickly through a combination of creature aggression and efficient removal.

The deck focuses on creating a powerful combo using Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian to generate infinite copies of the Felidar Guardian. By utilizing cards like Whirler Virtuoso, Rogue Refiner, and Chandra, Torch of Defiance to control the board and generate energy, the deck aims to create a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with a continuous stream of tokens. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure smooth casting of spells and enable the combo to go off consistently.

The deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence with efficient creatures and pumps from cards like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar and Verdurous Gearhulk. The deck is designed to overwhelm opponents with early threats like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Longtusk Cub, while also being able to protect key creatures with cards like Blossoming Defense. The inclusion of cards like Fatal Push and Walking Ballista provide removal options to clear the way for attacking. The synergy between cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade allows for explosive plays and efficient mana usage.

The main idea of this Golgari Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of low-cost and high-power creatures, supported by removal spells and pump effects. Utilizing cards like Walking Ballista, Verdurous Gearhulk, and Winding Constrictor, the deck aims to quickly build up a strong board presence while controlling the opponent's board with cards like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness. Additionally, cards like Grim Flayer and Tireless Tracker provide extra card advantage and synergize well with the deck's overall strategy. The deck's flexible mana base allows for consistency in playing its powerful threats on curve.

The main concept of the deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle using the Golgari color combination. By combining efficient creatures like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Verdurous Gearhulk with cards that provide energy like Aethersphere Harvester and Servant of the Conduit, the deck aims to quickly build a threatening board presence. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness allows for removal of opponent's threats to maintain control of the battlefield while cards like Tireless Tracker and Gonti, Lord of Luxury provide additional value and card advantage.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly build a strong board presence with creatures like Winding Constrictor, Sylvan Advocate, and Verdurous Gearhulk, while utilizing cards like Rishkar, Peema Renegade and Liliana, the Last Hope to further strengthen your creatures. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to deal with opponent's threats. The mana base is optimized with a mix of forests, swamps, and dual lands to ensure smooth gameplay. This deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient creatures and powerful synergies.

The main concept of the deck is to control the game by using a combination of removal spells, planeswalkers, and powerful creatures to maintain board presence and outvalue the opponent. The deck focuses on slowing down the opponent's game plan with removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness, while also utilizing cards like Liliana, the Last Hope and Ishkanah, Grafwidow to generate card advantage and stabilize the board. The deck also includes cards like Grim Flayer and Traverse the Ulvenwald to help find key pieces and maintain consistency throughout the game.

The deck focuses on aggressive creatures and vehicles to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Veteran Motorist alongside powerful vehicles such as Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain board presence throughout the game. Removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push help to clear the way for attacks, while planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provide additional threats and utility. The mana base includes a mix of dual lands to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for optimal card plays.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays and utilizing artifacts to maximize damage output. It includes powerful threats like Heart of Kiran and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, along with efficient removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push. Toolcraft Exemplar and Inventor's Apprentice help to quickly establish a board presence, while Pia Nalaar and Depala, Pilot Exemplar provide additional value. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast creatures and disruptive removal spells, putting pressure on the opponent and reducing their life total quickly.
